entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
